project.projectDescription: This data set contains information of students in various subjects, which contains gender, race/ethnicity, parental level of education, lunch, test prep course, math score, reading score and writing score. er can discover if there is a relationship between gender and test scores.
project.dataDescription: The data set contains information about students in high school from the United States. https://www.kaggle.com/spscientist/students-performance-in-exams We deleted half the dataset from 1000 observations to 500. We removed columns race/ethnicity, lunch, and test preparation course. We will have attached the .csv file that I modified.
project.researchQuestion: In this research, we would like to know with 95% confidence: Do female students usually score higher than male students in the various categories of reading, writing, and math?
project.conclusion: The conclusion is that females have higher test scores in subjects reading and writing, however, males are higher test scores in the math subject.
